00038 struct pluginDeleter {
00039     void *m_dlHandle;
00040     std::string m_pluginName;
00041     pluginDeleter( void *dlHandle, std::string pluginName ): m_dlHandle( dlHandle ), m_pluginName( pluginName ) {}
00042     void operator()( image_io::FileFormat *format ) {
00043         delete format;
00044 #ifdef WIN32
00045 
00046         if( !FreeLibrary( ( HINSTANCE )m_dlHandle ) )
00047 #else
00048         if ( dlclose( m_dlHandle ) != 0 )
00049 #endif
00050             std::cerr << "Failed to release plugin " << m_pluginName << " (was loaded at " << m_dlHandle << ")";
00051 
00052         //we cannot use LOG here, because the loggers are gone allready
00053     }
00054 };
00055 struct dialect_missing {
00056     std::string dialect;
00057     std::string filename;
00058     bool operator()( IOFactory::FileFormatList::reference ref )const {
00059         std::list<std::string> splitted = util::string2list<std::string>( ref->dialects( filename ), ' ' );
00060         const bool ret = ( std::find( splitted.begin(), splitted.end(), dialect ) == splitted.end() );
00061         LOG_IF( ret, Runtime, warning ) << ref->name() << " does not support the requested dialect " << util::MSubject( dialect );
00062         return ret;
00063     }
00064 };
00065 }

00071 
00072 bool IOFactory::registerFormat( const FileFormatPtr plugin )
00073 {
00074     if ( !plugin )return false;
00075 
00076     io_formats.push_back( plugin );
00077     std::list<util::istring> suffixes = plugin->getSuffixes(  );
00078     LOG( Runtime, info )
00079             << "Registering " << ( plugin->tainted() ? "tainted " : "" ) << "io-plugin "
00080             << util::MSubject( plugin->name() )
00081             << " with supported suffixes " << suffixes;
00082     BOOST_FOREACH( util::istring & it, suffixes ) {
00083         io_suffix[it].push_back( plugin );
00084     }
00085     return true;
00086 }
00087 
00088 unsigned int IOFactory::findPlugins( const std::string &path )
00089 {
00090     boost::filesystem::path p( path );
00091 
00092     if ( !exists( p ) ) {
00093         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << util::MSubject( p.native_file_string() ) << " not found";
00094         return 0;
00095     }
00096 
00097     if ( !boost::filesystem::is_directory( p ) ) {
00098         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << util::MSubject( p.native_file_string() ) << " is no directory";
00099         return 0;
00100     }
00101 
00102     LOG( Runtime, info )   << "Scanning " << util::MSubject( p ) << " for plugins";
00103     boost::regex pluginFilter( std::string( "^" ) + DL_PREFIX + "isisImageFormat_" + "[[:word:]]+" + DL_SUFFIX + "$" );
00104     unsigned int ret = 0;
00105 
00106     for ( boost::filesystem::directory_iterator itr( p ); itr != boost::filesystem::directory_iterator(); ++itr ) {
00107         if ( boost::filesystem::is_directory( *itr ) )continue;
00108 
00109         if ( boost::regex_match( itr->path().leaf(), pluginFilter ) ) {
00110             const std::string pluginName = itr->path().string();
00111 #ifdef WIN32
00112             HINSTANCE handle = LoadLibrary( pluginName.c_str() );
00113 #else
00114             void *handle = dlopen( pluginName.c_str(), RTLD_NOW );
00115 #endif
00116 
00117             if ( handle ) {
00118 #ifdef WIN32
00119                 image_io::FileFormat* ( *factory_func )() = ( image_io::FileFormat * ( * )() )GetProcAddress( handle, "factory" );
00120 #else
00121                 image_io::FileFormat* ( *factory_func )() = ( image_io::FileFormat * ( * )() )dlsym( handle, "factory" );
00122 #endif
00123 
00124                 if ( factory_func ) {
00125                     FileFormatPtr io_class( factory_func(), _internal::pluginDeleter( handle, pluginName ) );
00126 
00127                     if ( registerFormat( io_class ) )
00128                         ret++;
00129                     else
00130                         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "failed to register plugin " << util::MSubject( pluginName );
00131                 } else {
00132 #ifdef WIN32
00133                     LOG( Runtime, error )
00134                             << "could not get format factory function from " << util::MSubject( pluginName );
00135                     FreeLibrary( handle );
00136 #else
00137                     LOG( Runtime, error )
00138                             << "could not get format factory function from " << util::MSubject( pluginName ) << ":" << util::MSubject( dlerror() );
00139                     dlclose( handle );
00140 #endif
00141                 }
00142             } else
00143 #ifdef WIN32
00144                 LOG( Runtime, error )
00145                         << "Could not load library " << pluginName;
00146 
00147 #else
00148                 LOG( Runtime, error )
00149                         << "Could not load library " << pluginName << ":" << util::MSubject( dlerror() );
00150 #endif
00151         } else {
00152             LOG( Runtime, verbose_info )
00153                     << "Ignoring " << util::MSubject( itr->path() )
00154                     << " because it doesn't match " << pluginFilter.str();
00155         }
00156     }
00157 
00158     return ret;
00159 }

00161 IOFactory &IOFactory::get()
00162 {
00163     return util::Singletons::get<IOFactory, INT_MAX>();
00164 }

00166 int IOFactory::loadFile( isis::data::ChunkList &ret, const boost::filesystem::path &filename, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00167 {
00168     FileFormatList formatReader;
00169     formatReader = getFormatInterface( filename.string(), suffix_override, dialect );
00170     const size_t nimgs_old = ret.size();   // save number of chunks
00171     const std::string with_dialect = dialect.empty() ?
00172                                      std::string( "" ) : std::string( " with dialect \"" ) + dialect + "\"";
00173 
00174     if ( formatReader.empty() ) {
00175         if( !boost::filesystem::exists( filename ) ) {
00176             LOG( Runtime, error ) << util::MSubject( filename )
00177                                   << " does not exist as file, and no suitable plugin was found to generate data from "
00178                                   << ( suffix_override.empty() ? std::string( "that name" ) : std::string( "the suffix \"" ) + suffix_override + "\"" );
00179         } else if( suffix_override.empty() ) {
00180             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No plugin found to read " << filename.string() << with_dialect;
00181         } else {
00182             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No plugin supporting the requested suffix " << suffix_override << with_dialect << " was found";
00183         }
00184     } else {
00185         BOOST_FOREACH( FileFormatList::const_reference it, formatReader ) {
00186             LOG( ImageIoDebug, info )
00187                     << "plugin to load file" << with_dialect << " " << util::MSubject( filename ) << ": " << it->name();
00188 
00189             try {
00190                 return it->load( ret, filename.string(), dialect );
00191             } catch ( std::runtime_error &e ) {
00192                 LOG( Runtime, formatReader.size() > 1 ? warning : error )
00193                         << "Failed to load " <<  filename << " using " <<  it->name() << with_dialect << " ( " << e.what() << " )";
00194             }
00195         }
00196         LOG_IF( boost::filesystem::exists( filename ) && formatReader.size() > 1, Runtime, error ) << "No plugin was able to load: "   << util::MSubject( filename ) << with_dialect;
00197     }
00198 
00199     return ret.size() - nimgs_old;//no plugin of proposed list could load file
00200 }

00202 
00203 IOFactory::FileFormatList IOFactory::getFormatInterface( std::string filename, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00204 {
00205     std::list<std::string> ext;
00206     FileFormatList ret;
00207     _internal::dialect_missing remove_op;
00208 
00209     if( suffix_override.empty() ) { // detect suffixes from the filename
00210         const boost::filesystem::path fname( filename );
00211         ext = util::string2list<std::string>( fname.leaf(), '.' ); // get all suffixes
00212         ext.pop_front(); // remove the first "suffix" - actually the basename
00213     } else ext = util::string2list<std::string>( suffix_override, '.' );
00214 
00215     while( !ext.empty() ) {
00216         const util::istring wholeName( util::list2string( ext.begin(), ext.end(), ".", "", "" ).c_str() ); // (re)construct the rest of the suffix
00217         const std::map<util::istring, FileFormatList>::iterator found = io_suffix.find( wholeName );
00218 
00219         if( found != io_suffix.end() ) {
00220             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << found->second.size() << " plugins support suffix " << wholeName;
00221             ret.insert( ret.end(), found->second.begin(), found->second.end() );
00222         }
00223 
00224         ext.pop_front();
00225     }
00226 
00227     if( dialect.empty() ) {
00228         LOG( Debug, info ) << "No dialect given. Will use all " << ret.size() << " plugins";
00229     } else {//remove everything which lacks the dialect if there was some given
00230         remove_op.dialect = dialect;
00231         remove_op.filename = filename;
00232         ret.remove_if( remove_op );
00233         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Removed everything which does not support the dialect " << util::MSubject( dialect ) << " on " << filename << "(" << ret.size() << " plugins left)";
00234     }
00235 
00236     return ret;
00237 }

00239 
00240 data::ImageList IOFactory::load( const std::string &path, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00241 {
00242     const boost::filesystem::path p( path );
00243     ChunkList chunks;
00244     const int loaded = boost::filesystem::is_directory( p ) ?
00245                        get().loadPath( chunks, p, suffix_override, dialect ) :
00246                        get().loadFile( chunks, p, suffix_override, dialect );
00247     BOOST_FOREACH( data::ChunkList::reference ref, chunks ) {
00248         if ( ! ref->hasProperty( "source" ) )
00249             ref->setProperty( "source", p.string() );
00250     }
00251     LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Debug in list: " << chunks.size();
00252     const data::ImageList images( chunks );
00253     LOG( Runtime, info )
00254             << "Generated " << images.size() << " images out of " << loaded << " chunks loaded from " << ( boost::filesystem::is_directory( p ) ? "directory " : "" ) << p;
00255     return images;
00256 }
00257 
00258 int IOFactory::loadPath( isis::data::ChunkList &ret, const boost::filesystem::path &path, std::string suffix_override, std::string dialect )
00259 {
00260     int loaded = 0;
00261 
00262     if( m_feedback ) {
00263         const size_t length = std::distance( boost::filesystem::directory_iterator( path ), boost::filesystem::directory_iterator() ); //@todo this will also count directories
00264         m_feedback->show( length, std::string( "Reading " ) + util::Type<std::string>( length ).toString( false ) + " files from " + path.string() );
00265     }
00266 
00267     for ( boost::filesystem::directory_iterator i( path ); i != boost::filesystem::directory_iterator(); ++i )  {
00268         if ( boost::filesystem::is_directory( *i ) )continue;
00269 
00270         loaded += loadFile( ret, *i, suffix_override, dialect );
00271 
00272         if( m_feedback )
00273             m_feedback->progress();
00274     }
00275 
00276     if( m_feedback )
00277         m_feedback->close();
00278 
00279     return loaded;
00280 }
00281 
00282 bool IOFactory::write( const isis::data::ImageList &images, const std::string &path, std::string suffix_override, const std::string &dialect )
00283 {
00284     const FileFormatList formatWriter = get().getFormatInterface( path, suffix_override, dialect );
00285 
00286     BOOST_FOREACH( ImageList::const_reference ref, images ) {
00287         ref->checkMakeClean();
00288     }
00289 
00290     if( formatWriter.size() ) {
00291         BOOST_FOREACH( FileFormatList::const_reference it, formatWriter ) {
00292             LOG( Debug, info )
00293                     << "plugin to write to " <<  path << ": " << it->name()
00294                     <<  ( dialect.empty() ?
00295                           std::string( "" ) :
00296                           std::string( " using dialect: " ) + dialect
00297                         );
00298 
00299             try {
00300                 it->write( images, path, dialect );
00301                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << images.size()
00302                                      << " images written to " << path << " using " <<  it->name()
00303                                      <<  ( dialect.empty() ?
00304                                            std::string( "" ) :
00305                                            std::string( " and dialect: " ) + dialect
00306                                          );
00307                 return true;
00308             } catch ( std::runtime_error &e ) {
00309                 LOG( Runtime, warning )
00310                         << "Failed to write " <<  images.size()
00311                         << " images to " << path << " using " <<  it->name() << " (" << e.what() << ")";
00312             }
00313         }
00314     } else {
00315         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No plugin found to write to: " << path; //@todo error message missing
00316     }
00317 
00318     return false;
00319 }
00320 void IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( util::ProgressFeedback *feedback )
00321 {
00322     IOFactory &This = get();
00323 
00324     if( This.m_feedback )This.m_feedback->close();
00325 
00326     This.m_feedback = feedback;
00327 }
